acceptance-test-run.title: Podam should fill POJOs with protected, non default constructors
acceptance-test-run.name: podamShouldFillPojosWithProtectedNonDefaultConstructors

test-step.description: When I invoke the factory manufacturing for <span class='step-parameter'>class uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.pdm33.ProtectedNonDefaultConstructorPojo
Then the Object ProtectedNonDefaultConstructorPojo ( firstName = oA8bnWRL7h intField = 482639017 ) should not be null
Then the String field oA8bnWRL7h cannot be null or empty
Then the int field should not be zero
